sentence: You’re maybe going to have 15 or 20 more yards into the green, but the penalty for missing is greater than it was before as what people probably don’t realise is that pond on the left has been extended another 10 yards back towards the tee.” McIlroy will be one of the last three players to tackle the 11th in competition after being drawn in the final group on Thursday at 1403 local time (1903 BST) alongside Matt Fitzpatrick and Brooks Koepka.
